comment: Part 2 of the Riesz representation theorem for bounded linear functionals. The value of a bounded linear functional corresponds to a unique inner product. Part of Theorem 17.3 of [Halmos] p. 31. For part 1, see ~ riesz1 . (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
